name: Entrapped
description:
Entrapped is an experimental short text-adventure game, a mix between an interactive fiction and a classic adventure game (where you basically have an inventory and you need to solve some puzzles).

Compared to the classics of the genre there are several ways you can interact with the world, in an attempt to try and make the text commands as natural as possible, and with not too tight restrictions (so no need to learn the exact commands or the useful verbs).
You can play it in the browser here or download it and play it on your computer (Mac or Windows). No saves or stored data. Game is pretty short anyway :)

Soundtrack EP album is available for free on my Bandcamp page

If you enjoyed it (or if you have any constructive criticism) please leave a comment below. That will definitely encourage me in creating more games!

TIPS ABOUT HOW TO PLAY:
Even though a bit more advanced than the average text-adventure, the text parser is still quite limited. Try to use simple sentences and generic verbs like:
